original_title: Grutarally - the Return of “Kid’s Eating Trash”
overview: The Grutarally is a field trip in Israel, but unlike jeep tours, the journey is based on old vehicles whose total cost does not exceed NIS 3,500.This is not a competitive journey, the junctions are going unevenly, breaking down and crashing on the stones and dirt. The band, “Kid’s Eating Trash”, broke up three years earlier and is now going to a reunion show, which has lost its way and the Grutarally caravan is helping them. The band is final.
tagline: Grutarally - the Return of “Kid’s Eating Trash”
title: Grutarally - the Return of “Kid’s Eating Trash”
